sample.controller

Class LoadgameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • sample.controller.LoadgameController

  • public class LoadgameController
extends java.util.Observable
    This class loads the map into game window panel. Places the territories at their coordinates. Displays the player statistics such as no of armies held by the player and the no of cards holded by the player
    Author:
    Team43.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void allButtonAction()
      This method implements all-out mode, where once the attacker and attacked country have been identified, the attack proceeds with maximum number of dice and end only when either the attacker conquers the attacked, or the attacker cannot attack anymore.
      void allOutMode()
      This method implements the all out mode where the attacker attacks the country untill he gets that country or not have enough army.
      void assignTheContinentToThePlayer(javafx.scene.text.Text territoryWon)
      To assign the continent to the player.
      void attackPhase()
      This method implements the attackPhase.
      void attackProceedButtonAction()
      This function will asks the attacker country and attacking country and no of dice the player want roll.
      void battleWinnerAction(int opponentPlayerIndex)
      This function will implement the logic when the battle is won by the player checks if the player has won the territory, if yes the it checks it results in the winning the continent.
      boolean checkIfPlayerHasLostTheContinent(javafx.scene.text.Text territoryLost, int defenderPlayerIndex)
      To check if the player has lost the continent.
      boolean checkIfPlayerHasWonAnyContinent(javafx.scene.text.Text territoryWon)
      To check if the player has won any continent.
      void closeWindow()
      This closes the window and returns to the main window.
      void connectadjacentCountries(int srcX_pos, int srcY_pos, int desX_pos, int desY_pos, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      This function will draw the line between the countries.
      void connectCountries()
      This function will connect the adjacent countries by drawing the line to adjacent countries.
      void determineWhatToHappenAfterBattle(java.lang.String battleResult, int opponentPlayerIndex)
      This function will implement the logic according to the battle result.
      void disableOnlyPlayerNodes(int currentPlayer)
      This function diables player nodes so that the player can choose the which country to attack.

      This will set the current player mouseclick actions and disables other countries mouse click actions.

      To set up the map and buttons.

      To set visible or hide the cards exchange and skip buttons.

      To set visible or hide the attack and fortify buttons.

      This loads the players domination view where we can see the players control over the map and other actions.

      This method implements the logic according to the game current phase.

      To move text node from one group to another group
      void proceedAction()
      This method will display the confirmation button when selecting the source and destination countries and if both source and destination are different, then it will ask the player how many armies he want to move then it will call the player class can fortify method.
      void proceedToNextPhase(javafx.scene.control.TextField armiesPlayer, javafx.scene.control.TextField cardsPlayer)
      This function will call the reinforcementPhase function and display buttons for cards exchange or skip the cards exchange and proceed to next phase.
      void reinforcementPhase(javafx.scene.control.TextField armiesPlayer)
      This method calls the reinforcement method from the player class and updates the armies to the console

      This function removes the continent from the player list, if the player has lost the territory during the battle.
      void resetTheControlsAfterAttackIsDone()
      This function will set the UI to the default after attack is done.
      void setPlayerstats()
      This function will place the players army count and cards holded to the text field.
      void skipToNextPhase()
      This functions is used to skip from reinforcement phase to attack phase or fortify phase.
      void startAttacks()
      This function will check for adjacency between the attacking country and attacked country and then performs the attack.
      void startUpPhase(javafx.scene.text.Text clickedtext)
      This method will increase the army count by 1 on the territory in the startup phase.
      void updateThePlayerArmyField()
      This function updates the armies field of the current player.
      void updateThePlayerFieldsAfterAttack(int opponentPlayerIndex)
      This method will update the player fields after attack is done.
      void updateThePlayerObjectIfPlayerWonAnyCard()
      This will check if player has won any card during the attack phase if yes then it will draw a random card and adds to the player list and updates to the console.

      • drawTerritories

        public void drawTerritories()

        public void allButtonAction()

      • battleWinnerAction

        public void battleWinnerAction(int opponentPlayerIndex)
        This function will implement the logic when the battle is won by the player checks if the player has won the territory, if yes the it checks it results in the winning the continent. And also it draws a card if player has won any territory during the battle. checks if the defending player has lost the territory, if yes then it check if it results in loosing the continent. if yes it removes the continent.
        Parameters:
        opponentPlayerIndex -

      • getTheNoOfArmiesToMoveFromPlayerAfterWinningTerritory

      • proceedAction

        public void proceedAction()
        This method will display the confirmation button when selecting the source and destination countries and if both source and destination are different, then it will ask the player how many armies he want to move then it will call the player class can fortify method. If it returns true, then it will call a method from Player class that can do fortify and return true if it fortified.

      • loadPlayersDominationView

        public void loadPlayersDominationView()
        This loads the players domination view where we can see the players control over the map and other actions.

        continentIndex

      • closeWindow

        public void closeWindow()
        This closes the window and returns to the main window.
